abstract: Warren E. Buffett fielded questions at Berkshire Hathaway’s annual meeting. | Wall Street banks are embracing a rule they once hated. | A Delaware judge upheld Sotheby’s poison pill. | David Einhorn’s hedge fund asked the S.E.C. to delay disclosures.
